query:
UPDATE services.harvests harvest
                SET cultivar_id = COALESCE($1, harvest.cultivar_id),
                    location_id = COALESCE($2, harvest.location_id),
                    price = COALESCE($3, harvest.price),
                    type = $4,
                    description = $5,
                    available_at = COALESCE($6, harvest.available_at), 
                    updated_at = $7
                WHERE harvest.id = $8;
